card.text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.

card.name: Karakef, The Reclaimer, embalmed
card.text: {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard with a tomb counter on it. Activate this ability only if Karakef, The Reclaimer isn't a token. If Karakef, the Reclaimer is a token, you may cast cards in exile with Tomb counters on them, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them. Embalm {2}{W}{U}{B}.

card.name: Friendly Phelddagrif
card.text: Flying, hexproof, trample Whenever Friendly Phelddagrif attacks, each opponent creates a 3/3 green Hippo creature token, gains 2 life, and draws a card. Whenever Phelddagrif deals combat damage to a player, you may transform it.

card.name: Fearsome Firgaddlehp
card.text: Flying, first strike, deathtouch Whenever Fearsome Firgaddlehp attacks, each opponent sacrifices a creature, loses 2 life, and discards a card. Whenever Firgaddlehp, deals combat damage to a player, you may transform it.

card.text: This creature is all colors.

card.reverse-related: Gods' Eye, Gate to the Reikai

card.name: Chancellor Palpatine
card.text: Hexproof When Chancellor Palpatine enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, and it's your third end step since you last became the monarch, transform chancellor palpatine.

card.name: Emperor Palpatine
card.text: When this creature transforms into Emperor Palpatine, gain control of target creature for as long as you control Emperor Palpatine. Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Illusion
card.text: Flying

card.name: Srin the Withering Blaze
card.text: You can't play lands. Whenever Srin attacks, sacrificce a land and you draw a card. When Srin dies, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Srin the Flourishing Growth
card.text: Haste {T}:You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped. Then, if you control seven or more lands, transform Srin the Flourishing Growth.

card.name: Hound
card.text:
When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

DCFN Antroz the Goretracker 1 2

card.name: Lyla Lupine Alchemist
card.text: Hexproof Whenever a Werewolf you control transforms, exile the top card of your library with a howl counter on it. Then, if you own three or more cards in exile with howl counters on them, you may transform Lyla.

card.name: The Eternal Lycanthrope
card.text: Wolves and other Werewolves you control get +1/+1. You may play cards you own in exile with Howl conters on them.

card.name: The Altar
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws two or more cards, draw a card.

card.name: Siblis Redemption Seeker
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control with converted mana cost 3 or less dies, you may return a creature card with lesser converted mana cost from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you don't, create a 1/1 white spirit creature token.

card.name: Mayela The Drifting Petal
card.text: Flying, Vigilance {T}: Each player adds one mana of any color. The next spell you cast this turn can be cast as though it had assist.

card.name: Hecra Harvest Witch
card.text: Whenever you create one or more tokens, mill that many cards. {T}, Sacrifice three tokens: You may play up to three permanent cards from your graveyard this turn.

card.name: Ava Master Illusionist
card.text: Illusion spells you cast cost {1} less to cast and you may cast them as though they have flash. Whenever an Illusion enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it become a copy of target creature with lesser converted mana cost until end of turn.

card.name: Herman Beachcomber
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card. You may cast artifact spells from your graveyard. As an additional cost to cast spells this way, return an artifact you control to your hand.

card.name: Torvus Inspired Crafter
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, add {G}{U}{R}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities. {G}{U}{R}: Until end of turn, target artifact or land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental with haste and "whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card".

card.name: Rena Master of Mockery
card.text: Whenever Rena attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. Whenever a spell or ability you control causes a creature to become tapped, goad that creature. You may untap it.

card.name: Arel Maurer Bloodmage
card.text: Flying, Lifelink Instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. {T}, Pay 7 live: Copy target instant or sorcery spell that targets an opponent. You may choose new targets for the copy.
